name: Spooky Shove
description:
This is my entry for LD41, Puzzle game meets "Horror"

It's not everything I wanted it to be, but given i had limited time and was working alone im pretty happy with it. There's not a lot of content at the moment but it would be easy to create more levels, scares and variety of attirbutes.

As stated within the game there are "Jump scares", there's not a lot of explanations within the game but all you need to do is slide the coffins to get the black/red coffin out of the graveyard.
